title: Chains of Lust
description: Blackmail, lust and unspeakable acts are performed in a secret room when two adult video store workers create their own erotic film with a cast of unwilling women. Soon the police start sniffing around the scene, but not to stop the illicit movie magic - they want a piece of the action! Also known as ''Ryojoku no Rensa.'' Features: Scene access, art gallery, character sketches, textless opening and closing, Chains of Lust trailer, anime artform and trailers. Audio: English, Japanese. Subtitles: English. Adults only! Audio: English, Japanese. Subtitles: English subtitles.
